00017 
00037 class File {
00038 protected:
00044     File(const string &dir, const string &file,
00045          std::ios_base::openmode openMode,
00046          bool openNow);

00048 public:

00051         Current,      
00052         Beginning,    
00053         End           
00054     };
00055

00058

00064     void close();

00075

00079

00103

00107 
00110     const string& dirName();
00111

00142 *        Moved filters to Viewports rather than cameras. This makes filtering far
00143 *        more transparent, removes a number of redundant activate/viewport calls
00144 *        that were being made, and sets things up for viewports that have multiple
00145 *        RenderSources.
00146 *

00148 *        due to the afore mentioned changes to viewports and filters.
00149 *

00151 *        Setting the viewport no longer enables its target and enabling a
00152 *        framebuffer no longer sets the viewport.
